Comment: This file contains parameters for the HAN-OO solution

HANOODefaultParameters.Comment: Contains default parameters (often booleens) for application behaviours

HANOOParameters.Comment: Default parameter settings. Might be owerwritten by -<name> on command line (CLI)
HANOOParameters.-l: Show log data to tty (Standard output). You may send this to any tty device  (file etc.)

HANOODeviceData.Comment: Default parameter settings for different HAN devices (e.g. Aido, Kamstrup etc.)
